x-sap-shortText: API to access different kinds of payroll advances

info.title: Advances
info.description:
You can use these APIs to manage the information about payroll advances and the recovery of the advances.

 You can find your company's API server in [List of API Servers in SAP SuccessFactors.](https://help.sap.com/viewer/d599f15995d348a1b45ba5603e2aba9b/LATEST/en-US/af2b8d5437494b12be88fe374eba75b6.html)
